title: U.S. Education Department encourages schools to use AI in the classroom
description: The U.S. Secretary of Education, Linda McMahon, said in a statement Tuesday that artificial intelligence "drives personalized learning, sharpens critical thinking and prepares students with problem-solving skills that are vital for tomorrow's challenges."
content:
